swiggy - AVP of Product Management: Food B2C

Location - Bangalore, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time

It August 01, 2022

About Swiggy, the team & role

We @Swiggy are on a mission to elevate the quality of life for urban consumers by offering unparalleled convenience. We are all about building beautiful products that make this world a fun, and a more convenient place to live in!

While Swiggy offers a multi-category experience, the Food Business continues to be the top of the chain generating close to 1.3 Million orders per day through a 2 lakh+ strong, independent fleet of Delivery Executives spread across 500 cities!

The Food Growth team is responsible for building products that aim at continued category Growth, elevated food buying experience and monetization for our food marketplace. The three major streams within food are

  • Food growth: Pricing, Promotions and New Service Offerings (Categories like Gourmet, Guiltfree)
  • Food Monetization: 1P Ads
  • Food storefront Products: Food discovery and buying experience

AVP of Product management at Swiggy will manage a high performance team of Senior Product Managers, create long term strategic vision for the food business, and build products to achieve this vision. She/he will partner with dedicated technology and business teams to deliver a high quality portfolio of products successful at scale.

She/he will work closely with business and technology teams to build a strategy and roadmap for Food, helping our users find value and convenience in the most efficient manner leading to continued customer delight and seamless experience.

This person will have a consistent track record of being a leader of leaders, thinking big and owning product life-cycle end to end (ideation to execution) and associated business impact. she/he will be a creative problem solver who can create high leverage products in a complex environment and is right a lot!

What will you get to do here?

  • Build & own long term Product vision for the Food org (Growth and Storefront) while strategizing, planning and influencing to deliver on the planned roadmap
  • Partnering and influencing business and technology teams to develop and deliver on roadmaps while unlocking long term value for our customers and Swiggy business
  • Collaborate with other product teams across the org to ideate and find win-win-win solutions on common objectivesâ€™ across multiple categories and product lines impacted
  • Facilitate and nurture team members at all levels, foster a culture of innovation & learning with high emphasis on sustainable rituals
  • Determine the targets / success metrics for Food org based on the organizational strategy and be the custodian for these metrics
  • Contribute to ways of working and contribute actively to the ways of doing products at Swiggy

What qualities are we looking for :

  • Minimum 10 years of work experience in core Product Management with extensive experience building consumer growth & monetization products on commerce platforms
  • Product management experience in the consumer internet industry. Experience in core growth & engagement products would be a huge plus
  • Excellent understanding of Technology (data science and engineering) and UX design principles
  • Proven track-record of success in building and shipping high-quality data products at scale
  • Proven ability to lead a high performing team of Product managers , mentoring and crafting career interventions for Senior PMs
  • Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills
  • High degree of customer-obsession. You are an advocate of customer needs and aspirations and represent the customers across the lifecycle of products

We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by the law.
